data.name: SfFileManager
data.value: SfFileManager (27.2.2) Preview

data.name: SfFileManager_Desc_Key
data.value: The EJ2 FileManager component in PowerApps allows users to efficiently manage files and folders in a user-friendly interface. it offers seamless navigation and file operations, enhancing the user experience within PowerApps environments.

data.name: FileSystemData
data.value: FileSystem Data

data.name: EnableDarkMode
data.value: Enable Dark Mode

data.name: EnableDarkMode_Desc_Key
data.value: Toggle this option to switch the application interface to Dark Mode

data.name: FileManagerConfig
data.value: FileManager Config

data.name: FileManagerConfig_Desc_Key
data.value: The configuration settings for the FileManager component allow you to customize its features and behavior. For reference, you can find the default configuration in the JSON file located in the "components/filemanager/data" folder in the repository.

data.name: CssClass
data.value: Css Class

data.name: CssClass_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies the root CSS class of the file manager that allows you to customize the appearance by overriding the styles.

data.name: Path
data.value: Path

data.name: Path_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies the current path of the file manager.

data.name: RootAliasName
data.value: Root Alias Name

data.name: RootAliasName_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies the root folder alias name in file manager.

data.name: SortBy
data.value: Sort By

data.name: SortBy_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies the field name being used as the sorting criteria to sort the files of the file manager component.

data.name: SortOrder
data.value: Sort Order

data.name: SortOrder_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies a value that indicates whether the folders and files are sorted in the ascending or descending order, or they are not sorted at all.

data.name: View
data.value: View

data.name: View_Desc_Key
data.value: Specifies the initial view of the file manager. With the help of this property, initial view can be changed to details or large icons view.

data.name: AllowMultiSelection
data.value: Allow Multi Selection

data.name: AllowMultiSelection_Desc_Key
data.value: Enables or disables the multiple files selection of the file manager.

data.name: EnableVirtualization
data.value: Enable Virtualization

data.name: EnableVirtualization_Desc_Key
data.value: Gets or sets a value that enables/disables the virtualization feature of the File Manager. When enabled, the File Manager will only load a subset of files and folders based on the size of the view port, with the rest being loaded dynamically as the user scrolls vertically through the list. This can improve performance when dealing with a large number of files and folders, as it reduces the initial load time and memory usage.

data.name: ShowFileExtension
data.value: Show File Extension

data.name: ShowFileExtension_Desc_Key
data.value: Shows or hides the file extension in file manager.

data.name: ShowItemCheckBoxes
data.value: Show Item CheckBoxes

data.name: ShowItemCheckBoxes_Desc_Key
data.value: Gets or sets a boolean value that determines whether to display checkboxes in the file manager. If enabled, checkboxes are shown for files or folders on hover.

data.name: ShowThumbnail
data.value: Show Thumbnail

data.name: ShowThumbnail_Desc_Key
data.value: Shows or hides the thumbnail images in largeicons view.

data.name: Height
data.value: Height

data.name: Height_Desc_Key
data.value: Defines the height of the FileManager code component. It specifies the height of the FileManager when rendered in PowerApps table form.

data.name: NoDataSource_Message
data.value: There is no data available to display at the moment.

data.name: EventName
data.value: Event Name

data.name: EventName_Desc_Key
data.value: Output event name when OnChange is triggered.

data.name: OnError
data.value: On Error Event

data.name: OnError_Desc_Key
data.value: Outputs error message when onError is triggered.
